scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Crucifixion of Christ, with Jesus Christ nailed to a wooden cross. He is shown with a crown of thorns, wounds from the crucifixion, and a white loincloth. The background is a stylized landscape of blue sky and green earth, with hints of water and distant hills. The scene is framed by decorative architectural elements, suggesting it is part of a larger illuminated manuscript.
